column4: is xmms still available to play shoutcast streamsif not which else?
xmms has been remived for a long time now. You can try audacious http://packages.ubuntu.com/search?keywords=audacious&suite=default&section=all&arch=any&searchon=names
Looks like tunapie and audacious could work as combination http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1431727
